Description: MIJ, made in japan, Gibson, Lespaul, White, SG, Höfner, Duesenberg, Ibanez, ATELIER Z, ARIA, ESP, Caparison, Killer, COMBAT GUITARS, GUYATONE, Greco, Sugi Guitars, TEISCO, DEVISERA, Nil, Bacchus, VANZANDT, Fernandes, Fender Japan, Fujigen, MOON GUITARS, momose, Yairi Guitar, YAMAHA, TOKAI, Zemaitis, VOX, B, C, Rich, Epiphone, Gibson, Gretsch, Suhr, Schecter, Charvel, Jackson, Dean, Tom Anderson, Fender, Paul Reed Smith, Melancon, Mosrite, Rickenbacker, Robert Benedetto, Washburn, Ibanez, kramer, EDWARDS, Burny, Grassroots, 1987 Greco SS63-55 Deep joint / All Original The Mint Collection Very Good condition.Made in Japan Down from here, Photo is dent and scratches etc.. About scratches that are hard to see. To make it easy to understand the condition of the scratches, I lighted the light strongly. 1987 Greco SS63-55 Deep joint / All Original The Mint Collection Very Good condition.Made in Japan Body Mahogany. Neck Mahogany. Deep joint. Frets 22F. Scale 24.75inch (628mm) Gibson Scale. Nut Width About 1.69 inch (43mm). Pickup SCREAMIN x 2. Control 2 Volume, 2 Tone, 3-Way PU Toggle switch. Bridge Tune O Machic. Stop Tailpiece. Color It became Cream color from white color by aging. Weight About 6.51 Pound ( 2.95 Kg ). This is Used Guitar. There are scratches and dents. But fatal damage is not. I was shooting a lot of photos. Please confirm with a photograph. It was manufactured by Fujigen factory in 1987. It's the Mint Collection, most popular series from Greco. It was made about 31 years ago. The Mint Collection, I feel Greco's policy very much. Accuracy of the product is high, It is deep joint. From the body, the vibration of the sound is transmitted well. A natural relic has dignity. The color, It became Cream color from white color by aging. However I like it. The general SS 63-55 is cherry red, but this is white (cream). I can say that it is rare color model. " The High quality guitars at a Low price ". It is brand concept of Greco at the time. And current... It has became high price. 1980, Gibson filed a lawsuit. The cause is copyright issues. And more than anything, Greco's ( Fujigen's ) high degree of perfection. Perhaps Gibson had a feeling of crisis. I think this Greco is very good. Make of Greco (Fujigen) is very polite. Accuracy of the product is high. About guitar play, Current state, the space between the strings and the frets is very narrow. Thanks to that, I feel very easy to play the guitar. This Greco is Deep joint. Therefore Un pluged sound is very loud. You can feel vibrations transmitted to the body. The Pickups is original installed SCREAMIN. This SCREAMIN Pickup is excellence. And worldwide assessment is high. I feel the good Over drive and Distortion sound. The clean sound is also wonderful. Greco is Great !! It is cleanliness. I polished with guitar exclusive polish, so it is in a very clean state. I after the finger board cleaning, painted beeswax. The aim is moisturizing and and protection. Current neck condition, very good ! roughly straight ! There is no problem with the Truss rod and it can be adjusted. Remaining the frets are 83% on average. You can play immediately after it is delivered to you. I was set new strings. Regular tuning. ( Inch : 009, 011, 016, 024, 032, 042 ) Guitar playing, is comfortable. All is working well. It is in a very good condition. The Truss rod Wrench is not included. All Original.Note : The hard case key has been lost. Note : The Strap pin has been changed to lock type. GIG BAG Included. Look at the photos, please verify by yourself! It will be professionally pack. Double air packing. And ships inside a sturdy cardboard box. This electric guitar is USED. Please consider it when bidding. Thank you. Payment I accept PayPal only.
